header_text: As you wake up in the morning, you sit up quickly. Your vision goes blurry, and then goes black for a moment. Your vision comes back after a moment, and you tell yourself that you are going blind.

elements.text: You take a deep breath and realize that your vision is completely back. Then you remember that sometimes this happens when you sit up too...

elements.name: As you wake up in the morning, you sit up quickly. Your vision goes blurry, and then goes black for a moment. Your vision comes back after a moment, and you tell yourself that you are going blind._Physical Health_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
